parameters.body:
=
نتیجه بررسی:{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json['AI Analyze '].persian_analysis }} .
Description: {{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json['AI Analyze '].detailsMarkdown }}
Reference: {{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json['AI Analyze '].reference.toJsonString().replaceAll('"','').replaceAll('[','').replaceAll(']','').replaceAll(',','\\n') }}

parameters.jql: =project =  "{{$vars.JIRA_Project_Key_Field}}" AND issuetype = "{{$vars.JIRA_Security_Event_IssueType}}" AND status in (Open, Investigation, "Waiting for customer") AND {{$vars.JIRA_Alert_ID_CF_Field}} ~ "{{ $json.alertId }}"

parameters.content:
## Check and Handle Existing Jira Cases Triggered Externally
This section of the workflow is triggered by another workflow and is responsible for handling potential duplicate “Case” issues in Jira. It starts by receiving input via passthrough, then searches Jira for existing issues with the same title and certain statuses. Based on the result, it determines whether to create a new issue or simply add a comment to an existing one.

## Format and Comment on Existing Jira Case
This part of the workflow handles updating existing Jira case issues. It begins by formatting the `alertIds` into a structured object, then splits them to enable individual processing. Finally, it adds a detailed comment to the existing case, including analysis, description, result, and reason for traceability.

## Create Case  
   Creates a new Jira Case with detailed fields including title, severity, MITRE tactic, and descriptions from AI output.

## Link Case to Matching Alerts (Batch Processing)
This section loops over each `alertId`, performs a JQL-based search in Jira to check if related **Alert** issues already exist (with specific statuses). If a match is found, the Case is linked to the first matching Alert using the **Create Issue Link** operation. This ensures deduplication and traceable relationships between Case and Alert issues in Jira.

### Called by Workflows:
- Splunk AI — SP_Al_Case_Creation_Schaeduler_24h

parameters.jql: =project =  "{{$vars.JIRA_Project_Key_Field}}" AND issuetype = case AND status in (Open, Investigation, "Waiting for customer")  AND summary ~ "{{ $json['AI Analyze '].title }}"

parameters.content:
